fields.title: TerraLink Greenhouse AI
fields.short_description: SaaS web application that analyzes microclimate data to predict plant stress and disease 7-14 days ahead, providing actionable recommendations and alerts.
fields.long_description:
TerraLink Greenhouse AI is a comprehensive SaaS platform designed for modern greenhouse operations. Our AI-powered system analyzes microclimate data from sensors throughout your greenhouse to predict plant stress and disease before visible symptoms appear.

Key capabilities include:
- Real-time microclimate monitoring and analysis
- Predictive analytics with 7-14 day forecasting
- Intelligent recommendation engine for crop management
- Automated alert system for critical issues
- Optional integration with drone validation services
- Comprehensive dashboard with risk heatmaps

Built for scalability and designed to support precision agriculture practices with low-input interventions.
features: Predicts plant stress and disease 7-14 days ahead

fields.title: TerraLink Drone Validator
fields.short_description: Drone service for visual validation of AI predictions, providing high-resolution imagery and additional data analysis.
fields.long_description:
TerraLink Drone Validator is an optional service that complements our AI platform. When critical alerts are triggered, our drone service can be deployed to visually validate AI predictions.

The service includes:
- High-resolution aerial imagery of greenhouse areas
- Multi-spectral imaging for plant health analysis
- Detailed validation reports
- Integration with TerraLink Greenhouse AI platform
- Professional drone operators and equipment

This service is available on-demand and provides an additional layer of verification for critical predictions, helping you make informed decisions with confidence.

fields.name: AI Subscription - Standard
fields.details: Subscription pricing varies based on greenhouse size, number of sensors, and feature set. Includes AI predictions, alerts, dashboard access, and email support.

fields.name: Drone Service - Per Deployment
fields.details: Pricing varies based on greenhouse size, flight duration, and analysis complexity. Includes drone operation, imagery, analysis report, and integration with AI platform.

fields.description: Active pilot program testing TerraLink Greenhouse AI with select greenhouse operations. Program includes comprehensive monitoring, AI predictions, and validation services.
fields.nda_notice: Pilot location details are subject to NDA. Contact us for more information about pilot participation and results.
